name: KumoTeam
tag_list: saas, mobile, mobile-apps, service-software, software, web-applications, android, ios
overview:
KumoTeam is a Mobile SaaS Application that allows companies with Service Technicians in the field automate their entire workflow

The Technology allows customers to track the lead origin of the Job right down to completion , invoicing & payment workflows. All the data culminates into a strong BI reporting module

Strong plug & play 3rd party Integration & Business Intelligence are the USP that makes this technology stand out amongst competition

Started in 2012 March KumoTeam has built a product platform that is feature rich & customer centric.

Initial sales traction is amongst the SME segment with diverse geographies represented in the customer base , from India to Saudi Arabia , Australia & the US. They have secured a Major Telecom company as the first Enterprise customer

They have tied up 80+ reseller relationships.

The company has a 2 year product roadmap under way with a team of 6 engineers with plans to build out iOS & Android clients along with enhancing the web application A marketing & communications strategy is also underway
